original_text: The east wind carrieth him away, and he departeth: and as a storm hurleth him out of his place.
korean_text: 동풍이 그를 들어올리리니 그는 사라질 것이며 그의 처소에서 그를 몰아내리라

sentences.original_text: The east wind carrieth him away
and as a storm hurleth him out of his place
sentences.korean_translation: 폭풍이 그를 그 자리에서 내던지듯 하느니라
